alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 04 at 2:38PM MDT until November 06 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MDT SATURDAY TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches, locally higher on west facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...From 2 AM MDT Saturday to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Those traveling to the Upper Cottonwood Canyons should be prepared for deteriorating conditions overnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds are expected to result in reduced visibilities in blowing and drifting snow late tonight through Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
